author: Brian Turner
method: For the salad, mix together the salad ingredients in a bowl and set aside. To make the dressing whisk together the ingredients. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and serve.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz spinach,  ¼ onion, sliced thinly,  ¼ red pepper, thinly sliced ,  1 tbsp fresh dill, chopped,  3 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp white wine vinegar,  1 tsp wholegrain mustard,  salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
